app.title: GAME CENTER
app.subtitle: Select a game (long press for description)
app.exitConfirm: Do you want to exit Game Center?

common.hintWatchAdFull:
Watch an ad to get a hint?

‚Äª Please watch the ad to the end.

tetris.name: Tetris
tetris.subtitle: Tetris
tetris.description: Rotate and place falling blocks to complete horizontal lines. Game over when blocks reach the top!
tetris.objectiveDesc:
Place falling blocks to complete horizontal lines.
Completed lines disappear and you earn points.
tetris.controlsDesc:
‚Ä¢ ‚Üê‚Üí : Move block left/right
‚Ä¢ ‚Üì : Move block down faster
‚Ä¢ Rotate button : Rotate block 90¬∞
‚Ä¢ Drop button : Drop block instantly
tetris.scoringDesc:
‚Ä¢ 1 line: 100 points
‚Ä¢ 2 lines: 300 points
‚Ä¢ 3 lines: 500 points
‚Ä¢ 4 lines (Tetris): 800 points
tetris.gameOverDesc: The game ends when blocks reach the ceiling.

gomoku.name: Gomoku
gomoku.subtitle: Five in a Row
gomoku.description: Black and white take turns placing stones. First to get 5 in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins.
gomoku.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Be the first to place 5 stones in a row
horizontally, vertically, or diagonally!
gomoku.rulesHowToPlayDesc:
‚Ä¢ Black plays first
‚Ä¢ Take turns placing stones on empty spaces
‚Ä¢ Stones cannot be moved once placed
gomoku.rulesForbiddenDesc:
‚Ä¢ Double-three: Creating two open threes at once
‚Ä¢ Double-four: Creating two fours at once
‚Ä¢ Overline: Placing 6 or more stones in a row
gomoku.rulesTipsDesc:
Create an open four (unblocked on both ends)
and your opponent cannot defend!

othello.name: Othello
othello.subtitle: Reversi
othello.description: Flip opponent's pieces by sandwiching them. The player with more pieces when the board is full wins.
othello.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Have more discs than your opponent
when the game ends to win!
othello.rulesHowToPlayDesc:
‚Ä¢ Black plays first
‚Ä¢ Place discs to sandwich opponent's discs
  between your own to flip them
‚Ä¢ Pass if you have no valid moves
othello.rulesFlippingDesc:
‚Ä¢ Flip horizontally, vertically, or diagonally
‚Ä¢ Multiple directions can be flipped at once
‚Ä¢ You must flip at least one disc to place
othello.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Corners cannot be flipped once captured
‚Ä¢ Edges are also advantageous positions
‚Ä¢ Flipping fewer discs early can be beneficial

chess.name: Chess
chess.subtitle: Chess
chess.description: Classic strategy board game. Checkmate the opponent's king to win.
chess.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Checkmate your opponent's king to win!
(The king cannot escape capture)
chess.rulesBasicMovesDesc:
King (K): One square in any direction
Queen (Q): Any number of squares in any direction
Rook (R): Any number of squares horizontally/vertically
Bishop (B): Any number of squares diagonally
Knight (N): L-shaped move (can jump over pieces)
Pawn (P): One square forward, two squares on first move
chess.rulesSpecialMovesDesc:
Castling: Special king and rook move
En Passant: Special pawn capture
Promotion: Pawn reaching the end gets promoted
chess.rulesTipsDesc:
Stalemate: No legal moves but not in check
Insufficient Material: Not enough pieces to checkmate

janggi.name: Janggi
janggi.subtitle: Korean Chess
janggi.description: Traditional Korean board game. Capture the opponent's general to win.
janggi.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Checkmate the opponent's General (King) to win!
(When the General cannot escape from check)
janggi.rulesPieceMovementDesc:
‚Ä¢ General: 1 space within the palace
‚Ä¢ Chariot: Unlimited horizontal/vertical
‚Ä¢ Cannon: Jumps over pieces to move/capture
‚Ä¢ Horse: 1 space + 1 diagonal
‚Ä¢ Elephant: 1 space + 2 diagonal
‚Ä¢ Guard: 1 space within the palace
‚Ä¢ Soldier: 1 space forward/left/right
janggi.rulesSpecialDesc:
‚Ä¢ Check: Attacking the opponent's General
‚Ä¢ Checkmate: General cannot escape check
‚Ä¢ Bikjang: When Generals face each other directly
‚Ä¢ Cannon cannot jump over or capture another Cannon
janggi.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ The Chariot is the most powerful piece
‚Ä¢ Cannon needs another piece to jump over
‚Ä¢ Horse and Elephant are blocked by pieces in their path
janggi.geminiApiDesc: Enter Gemini API key to play against a smarter AI.
janggi.geminiApiGuide:
You can get a free API key from Google AI Studio:
https://aistudio.google.com/apikey

solitaire.name: Solitaire
solitaire.subtitle: Klondike
solitaire.description: Classic Klondike Solitaire. Stack all cards by suit from Ace to King to win.
solitaire.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Stack all cards on the 4 foundation piles
by suit from Ace to King!
solitaire.rulesHowToPlayDesc:
‚Ä¢ Tableau: Stack in descending order, alternating red/black
‚Ä¢ Foundation: Stack by suit in ascending order
‚Ä¢ Tap the deck to draw new cards
‚Ä¢ Only Kings can be placed on empty tableau spaces
solitaire.rulesCardMoveDesc:
‚Ä¢ Drag face-up cards to move them
‚Ä¢ Move multiple cards at once
‚Ä¢ Double-tap for auto-move to foundation
solitaire.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Move Aces to foundation immediately
‚Ä¢ Prioritize revealing face-down cards
‚Ä¢ Use Draw 1/Draw 3 mode to adjust difficulty

minesweeper.name: Minesweeper
minesweeper.subtitle: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Use number hints to reveal all safe cells. Step on a mine and it's game over!
minesweeper.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Reveal all cells without mines to win!
Step on a mine and it's game over!
minesweeper.rulesControlsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Tap: Reveal cell
‚Ä¢ Long press: Place/remove flag
‚Ä¢ Long press on number: Reveal surrounding cells
minesweeper.rulesNumbersDesc:
Numbers indicate how many mines
are in the surrounding 8 cells.
Example: "3" means 3 nearby mines
minesweeper.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ First click is never a mine
‚Ä¢ Use flags to mark mine locations
‚Ä¢ Use hints when you're stuck

baseball.name: Number Baseball
baseball.subtitle: Bulls and Cows
baseball.description: Guess the hidden number using strike and ball hints.
baseball.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Guess the 3-digit number chosen by the computer!
Each digit is unique, from 0 to 9.
baseball.rulesStrikeBallDesc:
‚Ä¢ Strike (S): Correct digit in correct position
‚Ä¢ Ball (B): Correct digit in wrong position
‚Ä¢ Out: No matching digits
baseball.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Use ball hints to find the correct digits first
‚Ä¢ Then try different positions for those digits
‚Ä¢ Use hints for extra help

onecard.name: One Card
onecard.subtitle: Crazy Eights
onecard.description: Play cards one at a time. First to empty their hand wins.
onecard.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Be the first to discard all your cards!
You must say "One Card" when you have one card left.
onecard.rulesHowToPlayDesc:
‚Ä¢ Play a card with the same number or suit
‚Ä¢ Draw one card from the deck if you can't play
‚Ä¢ Turns proceed counter-clockwise
onecard.rulesAttackCardsDesc:
‚Ä¢ 2: Draw +2 cards (stackable)
‚Ä¢ A: Draw +3 cards (‚ô†A is +5)
‚Ä¢ Black Joker: Draw +5 cards
‚Ä¢ Color Joker: Draw +7 cards (unblockable)
onecard.rulesDefenseDesc:
‚Ä¢ Against 2 ‚Üí Defend with 2, same-suit A, or Joker
‚Ä¢ Against A ‚Üí Defend with A or Joker
‚Ä¢ Against Black Joker ‚Üí Only Color Joker
‚Ä¢ Against Color Joker ‚Üí Cannot defend!
‚Ä¢ Defense stacks the attack to the next player
onecard.rulesSpecialCardsDesc:
‚Ä¢ 7: Change suit
‚Ä¢ J: Skip next player
‚Ä¢ Q: Reverse direction
‚Ä¢ K: Skip 2 consecutive turns
onecard.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Defend attacks with equal or stronger attack cards
‚Ä¢ Use Jokers wisely - they're powerful
‚Ä¢ Missing "One Card" on your last card results in a penalty!

yutnori.name: Yutnori
yutnori.subtitle: Korean Board Game
yutnori.description: Traditional Korean board game. Throw yut sticks and move all your pieces to the goal to win.
yutnori.rulesObjectiveDesc: Be the first to move all 4 pieces to the goal!
yutnori.rulesYutResultsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Do: Move 1 space
‚Ä¢ Gae: Move 2 spaces
‚Ä¢ Geol: Move 3 spaces
‚Ä¢ Yut: Move 4 spaces + throw again
‚Ä¢ Mo: Move 5 spaces + throw again
‚Ä¢ Back Do: Move 1 space backward (-1)
yutnori.rulesSpecialDesc:
‚Ä¢ Stop at corners to take shortcuts
‚Ä¢ Capture opponent's piece to throw again
‚Ä¢ Stack your pieces (move together)
‚Ä¢ If stacked pieces are captured, all go back
yutnori.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Use corner shortcuts actively
‚Ä¢ Stack pieces for safety
‚Ä¢ Capture opponents for extra turns!

hula.name: Hula
hula.subtitle: Hwatu Card Game
hula.description: Korean flower card game. Combine cards and be the first to play all your cards to win.
hula.rulesObjectiveDesc:
Minimize your hand's card points to win.
Play all 7 cards at once for "Hula"!
hula.rulesProgressDesc:
1. Draw 1 card from deck
2. Register melds (Run, Group, 7) or attach
3. Discard 1 card
‚Ä¢ Play counterclockwise
hula.rulesMeldTypesDesc:
‚Ä¢ Run: 3+ consecutive same suit
  (e.g., ‚ô†3-‚ô†4-‚ô†5)
‚Ä¢ Group: 3-4 same numbers
  (e.g., ‚ô†5-‚ô•5-‚ô¶5)
hula.rulesSevenDesc:
‚Ä¢ 7 can be registered alone!
‚Ä¢ Can also be part of Run/Group
‚Ä¢ After solo registration, only extend as Run
  (attach same suit 6 or 8)
hula.rulesThankYouMeldDesc:
‚Ä¢ Thank You: Take discarded card and register immediately
‚Ä¢ Attach: Only if you have melds
  (can add to own or opponent's melds)
hula.rulesStopDesc:
‚Ä¢ Can declare Stop anytime
‚Ä¢ Player with lowest hand points wins on Stop
‚Ä¢ Advantageous when you have few cards!
hula.rulesScoringDesc:
‚Ä¢ A = 1 point
‚Ä¢ 2-9 = face value
‚Ä¢ J = 10, Q = 11, K = 12 points

sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.subtitle: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Fill the 9x9 grid with numbers 1-9. Each row, column, and 3x3 box must contain no duplicates.
sudoku.quickInputGuide: Number {num} selected - Tap cell to input
sudoku.eraseMode: Erase mode - Tap cell to erase

numberSums.name: Number Sums
numberSums.subtitle: Number Sums
numberSums.description: Fill in the blanks using the sum hints for rows and columns.
numberSums.rulesObjectiveDesc: Use the row and column sum hints to fill in the blanks!
numberSums.rulesBasicDesc:
‚Ä¢ Each row contains 1 to N once (N = board size)
‚Ä¢ Each column contains 1 to N once
‚Ä¢ No duplicate numbers allowed
numberSums.rulesSumHintsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Numbers at the end of rows/columns are sum hints
‚Ä¢ They indicate the sum of specific cells in that row/column
‚Ä¢ Cells without hints are not included in the sum
numberSums.rulesTipsDesc:
‚Ä¢ Start with smaller sums
‚Ä¢ Use both row and column hints together
‚Ä¢ Use elimination to narrow down possible numbers

dialog.savedGameMessage:
You have a saved game.
Would you like to continue?
dialog.undoMessage: Watch an ad to use undo?
dialog.hintMessage: Watch an ad to use hint?
dialog.fillNotesMessage: Watch an ad to fill all notes?
dialog.hintModeMessage: Watch an ad to use hint mode?
